name: myopentrader
short_description:
Thanks for showing interest in MyOpenTrader (MOT). Please note, that this is a very small project – and make sure to understand what MOT is NOT. MOT is (yet another) a complex-event based open-source trading-engine, which is free to use for everyone. We have started MOT in 2012 and we have been using MOT ever since successfully. The best way of describing MOT is a flexible open-source trading framework. It is built from ground up as a parallel computing engine, which allows to do large scale parallel backtesting.

MOT is distributed under the GPL v3 License and is free to use for everyone without warranty. MyOpenTrader.org is not responsible for any of your trading losses and can not be held accountable. Use the framework at your OWN risk.

MOT is written purely in Java (1.6++) and has dependencies on a DB as well as a MQ Broker (such as ActiveMQ).
